main event: A bright fireball shaped like a convex lens was observed moving at an accelerating rate at Mitchell AFB, New York on January 20, 1953.
interesting points: The fireball was seen traveling at a high rate of speed and could accelerate rapidly., The object was described as being 11 inches long., There were no photographs or physical evidence contained in the report., Witnesses included military personnel at the airbase., The conclusion suggested it was probably an atmospheric phenomenon.
